params.880:
- All of your attacks have 10% increased accuracy and 10% increased damage.

- Whenever one of your attacks successfully hits, up to 5 additional targets next to your opponent will also be hit. The damage dealt to these additional targets will be 100% of the initial damage.

- This Relic does not work for multi-target attacks or special attacks.

- This Relic will only work in a multi-way combat area.

- This Relic does not work with the Scythe of Vitur.
